constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL SB1  South of the Borough

decision_conditions: In respect of condition 1 of application reference 20/02984/HOU ,The following plans: Site location and Block PlanProposed Plans Sheet 7 of 7 Existing Front and Rear Elevations Sheet 2 of 7Existing and Proposed Roof Plan Sheet 4 of 7Existing Side Elevations Sheet 3 of 7Proposed Side Elevations Sheet 6 of 7Proposed Elevations Sheet 5 of 7Proposed Roof PlanProposed Floor Planare replaced by:Site Location and Block Plan Sheet 1 of 9 with application ref Existing Ground Floor Plan Sheet 8 of 9Existing Front and Rear Elevations Sheet 2 of 9Existing Side Elevation Sheet 3 of 9Roof Plan showing existing and proposed works Sheet 4 of 9Proposed Side elevations  Sheet 1 of 9Proposed Side Elevations Sheet 5 of 9Proposed Floor Plan Sheet 7 of 9 Proposed Side Elevations 6 of 9 Each of these  replacement drawings has title reference to   24/01828/NMA Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 20/02984/HOU (Erection of replacement porch and extension to garage.). Amendment to increase width and reduce length of proposed porch and addition of windows to each side of porch door.
